mapper.select: select movie_id,movie_name,movie_english_name,movie_want_to_see,mt_message,mr_message,my_message,ms_message,movie_time,movie_introduce from movie_info mi left join movie_type mt on mi.movie_type=mt.mt_id left join movie_region mr on mi.movie_region=mr.mr_id left join movie_year my on mi.movie_year=my.my_id left join movie_state ms on mi.movie_state=ms.ms_id

select movie_id,movie_name,movie_english_name,movie_want_to_see,mt_message,mr_message,my_message,ms_message,movie_time,movie_introduce from movie_info mi left join movie_type mt on mi.movie_type=mt.mt_id left join movie_region mr on mi.movie_region=mr.mr_id left join movie_year my on mi.movie_year=my.my_id left join movie_state ms on mi.movie_state=ms.ms_id where ms_id = #{State}
select mt_id,mt_message from movie_type order by mt_id asc
select my_id,my_message from movie_year order by my_id desc
select mr_id,mr_message from movie_region order by mr_id asc

select movie_id,movie_name,movie_english_name,movie_want_to_see,mt_message,mr_message,my_message,ms_message,movie_time,movie_introduce from movie_info mi left join movie_type mt on mi.movie_type=mt.mt_id left join movie_region mr on mi.movie_region=mr.mr_id left join movie_year my on mi.movie_year=my.my_id left join movie_state ms on mi.movie_state=ms.ms_id where movie_id = #{movieId}
select mi_path from movie_image where mi_movie_id = #{movieId} and mi_type=1
select mi_path from movie_image where mi_movie_id = #{movieId} and mi_type=2

select mi.movie_id,mi.movie_name,mo.mi_path from movie_info mi left join movie_image mo on mo.mi_movie_id=mi.movie_id left join actor_join_movie ajm on ajm.movie_id=mi.movie_id left join actor_info ai on ai.actor_id=ajm.actor_id where ai.actor_id =#{actorId} and mo.mi_type=1

select mi.movie_id,mi.movie_name,mo.mi_path,avg(co.mc_scroe) as mc_scroe from movie_info mi left join movie_image mo on mo.mi_movie_id=mi.movie_id left join actor_join_movie ajm on ajm.movie_id=mi.movie_id left join actor_info ai on ai.actor_id=ajm.actor_id LEFT JOIN movie_comment co on mi.movie_id=co.movie_id WHERE mi.movie_state=1 GROUP BY mi.movie_id,mi.movie_name,mo.mi_path ORDER BY mc_scroe DESC LIMIT 10

select mi.movie_id,mi.movie_name,mo.mi_path,mi.movie_want_to_see from movie_info mi left join movie_image mo on mo.mi_movie_id=mi.movie_id left join actor_join_movie ajm on ajm.movie_id=mi.movie_id left join actor_info ai on ai.actor_id=ajm.actor_id LEFT JOIN movie_comment co on mi.movie_id=co.movie_id WHERE mi.movie_state=1 GROUP BY mi.movie_id,mi.movie_name,mo.mi_path ORDER BY movie_want_to_see DESC LIMIT 10

select mi.movie_id,mi.movie_name,mo.mi_path,avg(co.mc_scroe) as mc_scroe from movie_info mi left join movie_image mo on mo.mi_movie_id=mi.movie_id left join actor_join_movie ajm on ajm.movie_id=mi.movie_id left join actor_info ai on ai.actor_id=ajm.actor_id LEFT JOIN movie_comment co on mi.movie_id=co.movie_id GROUP BY mi.movie_id,mi.movie_name,mo.mi_path ORDER BY mc_scroe DESC
